
============
Coiled Cloud
============

Coiled is a Python package that lets you easily create, manage, and
connect to Dask deployments using `Coiled Cloud <https://coiled.io/>`_.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:

   getting_started
   user_guide/index
   api
   changelog

.. panels::
   :body: text-center
   :header: text-center h5 bg-white
   :footer: border-0 bg-white

   Getting Started :opticon:`fire,size=24`
   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

   New to Coiled? The Getting Started guide covers installation and the basics
   of Coiled.

   +++

   .. link-button:: getting_started
      :type: ref
      :text: Go To Getting Started
      :classes: btn-outline-primary btn-block stretched-link

   ---

   User Guide :opticon:`info,size=24`
   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

   The User Guide covers core concepts of Coiled while providing additional
   context and examples.

   +++

   .. link-button:: user_guide/index
      :type: ref
      :text: Go To User Guide
      :classes: btn-outline-primary btn-block stretched-link


   ---

   API Reference :opticon:`gear,size=24`
   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

   The API documentation lists all available classes and functions in the
   Coiled Python API, as well as parameters and description of their functionality.

   +++

   .. link-button:: api
      :type: ref
      :text: Go To API Docs
      :classes: btn-outline-primary btn-block stretched-link

      :type: ref

Feedback
--------

Feedback on Coiled is always welcome and encouraged. If you have any
comments, questions, or other feedback, please
`open an issue <https://github.com/coiled/cloud-issues/issues/new>`_ in the
Coiled issue tracker on GitHub.

.. link-button:: https://github.com/coiled/cloud-issues/issues/new
    :type: url
    :text: Report an issue
    :classes: btn-outline-primary btn-block


Thank you for trying out Coiled!
